review: Out of a sudden without any warning when I tried to use the App, it prompted me to upgrade it. Then when I did so, it returned and indicated to me that my phone is not compatible. Citibank did not learn from the LTA fiasco about the EZlink card issue. Citibank should at least sent notification to all the account holders in a push mail via SMS to warn well beforehand that the new upgrade of the APP requires the Handphone OS to be at least Andriod "X" but not only when one wants to use it. Sigh!!!

Downloaded the app and activated my digital card for Citi PremierMiles. The temporary cvv popped up and I didnt take notice of it. Subsequent attempts to view the temporary cvv led to a pop up to activate my physical card instead. So i can see the card number, expiry date but not the cvv!!!! Messaged the customer center but they said they needed to escalate to the relevant teams to solve this. Seems like a bug.

-1 Stars. **Stop telling user to send email for support. U Tell Your Support Team The Issue!! ** .. Will give negative star if have the option. Now even our phone keyboard also want to monitor. Why Google Keyboard is also not allow!!?? Useless most lousy banking apps in SG! Slow loading and not user friendly! .. Not able to use if Developer Option is enable! Sometimes need to enable Developer Option to have certain function on the phone. Citibank So Disappointed In You! üò°

The Citibank IT set-up is deplorable. Functions on the app don't work. There is a Global Wallet but it is unable to process a basic payee set-up even though there is nothing wrong with the receiving account's information. The app just keeps saying the information is invalid. Question: why bother providing IT banking functions when they don't work? I suspect the IT team never ever tests out the app or online banking functions themselves before launching the service. Customers beware.

**Update: app defaulted back to personal acct for payment last couple months. Everything seems good.** I'm a citibank client for many years, and i recently opened another acct (joint) with them. Now App will default to using the new joint acct when i make payment instead of staying with old acct (personal). It's not the first time i've to make restitutions of the amt wrongly deducted together with embarrassing explanation to my partner. The privacy of my personal spendings was also compromised.
The app forces u to use the default Samsung keyboard on your phone or else will not be able to type anything. This is such a bad experience as we have to keep switching keyboards.

Generally not intuitive. And also, why are you forcing me to change back to Samsung keyboard to use your app? Why can't you just let me use my default which is Google keyboard? Then I have to change my default keyboard settings after using your app. Ridiculous design. Did no one test it?

The app has been crashing every now and then for the past 2 months since I signed up. I had to uninstall and reinstall and re-register every time. This time, I have already uninstalled and reinstalled but it still keeps crashing, I can't even enter my password. Can't check my statement, can't enquire. Tried to facebook dm and the automated message asks me to use the app????? Please advise, thank you.

Updated 12 march 2024. OMG.... still the worst bank app after all these years. I tried changing my app pin but it gave me an error. Someone tried to use my cc (just gotten a brand new card like a week ago). Hotline is still putting me on hold even if I chose emergency option. Sucks. Old review: Worst banking app. Entered the sms pin code sent to my mobile but didn't work. tried 3 times n I'm locked out. now they are going to charge me for late penalty since I've no idea how much my cc bill is.

Suddenly it just stop me to login and popup message said it detected "developer options" in my phone. I have checked my phone it has not enable. I has gone further to enable and then disable the developer options to ensure my phone really disabled. However, the app still not allows me to login. I will stop using the card until it's fixed. Reply: My phone is not in developer mode. I doubt your app has detected wrongly and send me the wrong message also.

New review - Issue settled within a day. Even after I've turn off the mentioned settings, had some issue to log in. Called in & customer service officer helped me to rectify. Very efficient. Old review - Been really a hassle to log in using app. It's stated that it can't access to the app due to it detected 'USB debugging settings under Developer Options is enable. Emailed the bank too. This issue started a few months ago, I've been using the app for a few years now with no problem. Pls help.

Not sure the reason of latency as it's been quite a recent experience that I have. Additionally, the chatbot feature is not working at all, never have I ever gotten a reply from there and I will still need to go through the call centre route. Disappointed in the discrepancy on the Google search result Vs the actually functionality of fees waiver request on the chatbot
The latest update claims that Google keyboard (downloaded from Google play store) is an "untrusted" keyboard so now I can't type anything in the app now, making it completely useless.

Ever since the app came out the customer service standard plummeted! Very disappointed with this supposedly global giant. Now I can't even get a call back after a month. Update: only after this post call a call back. Resolved some issues. However the issue from Sept stayed unresolved. Was promised an sms but it's been 7 days and nothing... same as previous months!

First time logging onto citibank app to check in with my credit card and it was very painful to do. Setup process has issues like looping at asking me if i wanna use biometric(fingerprint) to log in. Accept it and still ask me non stop. Navigating the app is slow and laggy, menu needs to load for each visit. UI is hard to make sense of. Now try this with elderly and they throw out the phone.

Citi Mobile Token suddenly not working because of the upgrade popup. Unable to get the token unless I downloaded the new application first, which take longer time. Why do you NEED my name and contact number? I just need to approve a transaction, why the older application that was previously working fine suddenly stopped working just because a new version is available? A simple tap to approve become a lot of steps because I need to download and install the new version first.

Worst banking app among all the apps I have used. Constantly using push notifications to promote "new" services even when i have already opted out. Interface is extremely laggy and every step takes agonizing seconds to load when it should be instant
No longer functional, as the app rejects using Microsoft SwiftKey keyboard, and so unable to type in the app. Security protections gone absurd...
Not friendly. Terrible so is the auto phone. Going round in circles. No proper channel to ask a simple question. Cant even request for a return call.
Hi, l received 'Unable to proceed' message error while opening this app. Pls assist me to rectify the error. My name Kenny Teo Kian Beng. Thanks

Can't login and totally blind from the account status. Customer service being unhelpful on resolving the issue and leaving me no choice but to terminate account asap to avoid another possibility of unpaid outstanding charges (about $200) which had happened before. Citibank customer service standard used to be very high however now has dropped over the last three years to a unbelievable level.

Developer options is off yet app keep prompting about it and auto close off - Update: For those with Developer Options issue, turning off Developer Options won't help. To resolve, simply enabled it (google how) and scroll down to turn off USB Debugging.

Cannot login or open the app despite my phone is not in developer mode. Stupid updates After 1-2 months, this issues still isn't solved. I need to access the app to check the outstanding amount. But I freaking can't. Can you guys do something about this? Is crazy that so many banking app doesn't have this kind of issues.

Worst bank app I ever seen. Worst support ever. Application just expand and collapse header graphics every time you scroll. Payments just doesn't work when you need it. Concierge service is impossible to use. I think the best option for anyone who is looking into Citibank as their bank - avoid this unprofessional service.

Avoid using Citi services. They have lost their way of enabling customers. Now its just making money by applying random charges on your cc and they have made it so difficult to even reach customer care, customer is left with interest and fines imposed and they you are left with no option than paying the value. Since 2 months i am struggling to get get my waiver of annual fees , but no one replies and i am charged .

I also have the same issue of logging in, and the apps keep on turned off by itself. Restarted my phone however the issue still exists. Not able to see anything inside. Able to provide me the email for the matter.

How did an update make it worse. Developer mode is a useless function which doesn't solve a problem. And now u can't even log in and it auto offs without u doing anything, the lack of attention to the basics is disappointing. Let alone the slow and glitchy ui. Does this mean my bills are now void? üòÇüòÇ

The app is not user-friendly. I have been looking for a priority pass key for the last 3 days and am still not able to find it. I tried to pay my last bill, but there is no option available to pay from this app. Once in a while, this app says I am not a registered user.

Digital card have fixed number of transaction limits and the limits are not stated upfront and explicitly. Have called in and talked to the customer service manager to remove the limit and explain that there is no fraud possibility, but citibank is unable to remove limit or resolve my issue. First time using Citibank, and I am disappointed in Citibank and its service. Why offer the digital card service in the first place when there is no option to extend/override limit

Using for 10 days after getting the prestige cc. Can safely conclude this is one of the worst banking mobile apps in Singapore. Frozen screens and generally slow, this is a far cry from the experience provided by other mobile banking apps in SG (standard chartered for example). Was expecting much better than this

such a bad app !! 1/ can't login, the screen keeps loading for several minutes after fingerprint, and then mostly fails 2/ once-in-a-few days when it does manage to login, it floods my phone with numerous outdated notifications 3/ as a result, can almost never use the app for transaction verification. Citibank HK has exactly the same app, but that somehow works perfectly & smoothly

Terrible! My wife asks me to book car for festivities and she wants to pass me $160 by doing a 'credit card payment' to my credit card, but instead of it displayed as a credit with the font in green color, my Citi app shows it as a debit "-$ 160" ! A bank that cant differentiate between which is credit, which is debit, is a big NO! in banking industry ! Over a span of several years, this is the 2nd or 3rd time this 'debit' error happens with Citi credit cards. Seems this problem was never fixed.
I am unable to login to my app since last week! The icon keep circling yet it doesn't changed at all! I thought I might need to update but my version is the newest! What is wrong with it??!!

Advertising messages via push notifications hidden as transaction notifications that you can't turn off (you will lose both advertising and important transaction notifications) Duplicate notifications for the same message.

I would give a zero if I could! Ever time I have to carry out authentication and return back to the browser page, the whole webpage just hangs even. Same goes for app even though I update the app very frequently. First world international bank but third world technology and customer service!

Buggy with the login process, and API connection when a third party payment request is made. The product manager needs to be replaced since looking at the feedback (s) he has not been able to fix the basic login process despite several complaints by customers.
Recent update cause my Google board (gboard) to not work with the app..please help.

This update is even worse than the previous one. I am now totally unable to log in due to the false developer options thing. I can't even login on the internet because internet mobile login has been disabled. I need to switch banks soon

Say developer option on. Cannot enter the app. Turn off the developer option still cannot. Reinstall still cannot. Called customer service asked for paper copy till resolution of the issue. No paper copy received till date.

Been trying to download the app for ages to no avail ... and now they have disabled their phone contact numbers. Now I can't even contact anybody even though I'm holding their credit card for more than 30 years

Honestly one of the worst apps I've ever used. It never works. I can never log in and am always forced to uninstall and reinstall. I can't use it for the authentication cos I simply can't launch it. The payment of bills is terrible! After paying the bill, there's no indication that its paid! I once triple paid my bill because I didn't know whether or not the payment went through! (and on that note, they will not reverse the payment to the bank but instead will take 2 wks to send the cheque to u!)

I've used other banking apps and they are very intuitive but this citibank app is just horrible. Firstly, the estatement button seems to be very well hidden, which is extremely difficult to find. Secondly hate the point system, doesn't tell you the expiry date but 60days before the expiry. The app doesn't link to the reward page, and even the reward page is horrible. If you have multiple cards you choose the first card, you cant go back to the second card. Login always hang. Bad!

Hotline asks for us to go to the app for all other banking transactions but there are very few services available at all! I'd like to ask for annual fee waiver but there's no such option and it doesnt have that option on the phone service. This app just functions as a bill viewer. That's all. Totally not helpful to consumers or your own staff!

Very bad, many times I can't even log in. Always show log in error. Even at times when I can log in, a lot of info can't be seen. It shows no recent transactions when I actually have and I can't even see the balance. When is the payment due and amount. Tried to call your number for help but unable to speak to any of your staff. Always answered by machine and even I choose to speak to customer officer, also unable to. Very bad service.

The only reason why I had this app was the ability to generate tokens from the main page. Now it is hidden somewhere in the settings. Generating a token takes a lot longer than just getting an SMS with an OTP. Since the app doesn't serve its purpose anymore, uninstalled 136MB(!) freed. In addition, often the welcome screen says login, then fingerprint is read, then nothing happens. A step back reveals a circle, circling forever. Have to kill the app and restart it to work.

I'd rather not install the new update if given a choice. The retardation in the new update is just frustrating. Tapping on the back arrow or X (to close window) either takes forever to return or don't work at all. I've to close the app & login again to access the home page coz it's quicker. Before the update, the app was so responsive... now, it's a total drag. Customer service operators are apparently not equipped to handle advanced questions pertaining to the app. The management is to blame.

The new updated app is horrible. Loading times are much slower and sometimes I have to just restart the app just to check something. I'm also unable to delete my office number without inputting a fake 8-digit number. I also have difficulty seeing the 2nd text field onwards on certain forms, even though I have to type in those fields. Can't see what I'm typing as the keyboard blocks the fields and the page doesn't scroll downwards. My name is also spelt wrongly on the app now; I can't edit it.

Poor app, bad bank. Not only is the app not optimised for Android (unable to navigate back), it's one of the worst banking apps I've used as I can't accurately see how much I need to pay for cards. Multiple times I'll have paid the amount shown on app, but receive emails saying I still owe a couple of dollars and may be charged interest. Overall a very very poor experience and I'll cancel my cards and account soon.

1. It takes a lot of tapping to get to the balance, why do I have to tap a button before scanning fingerprints/face Id? 2. UI is overloaded with unnecessary information / adverts, I can't see the balance after opening the app 3. After logging in the app keeps loading panels, the view is jerking for a few seconds before I can actually do anything useful 4. There is no way of rebating cash back from the app, I have to go to messages and send a text with magic words to magic number. Embarrassing

This app is horrible. Can't get the information needed. Not so easy to navigate. And the bank hotline is forever busy, once pick up they hang up on me several times! Very very very bad experience with them. This app doesn't really serve it's purpose. I wanted to get in touch to clear out what's the anonymous charges that keep incurring monthly. The app doesn't let me type message

Not user friendly at all. When i click get in touch. It told me to contact Citi Phone banking. But the number or contact details did not appear at all. I have to navigate elsewhere to search for it instead. So dumb. Also, I can't get much things done on it as well like waiver. I still have to go through phone line. Please enhance it to spare us the agony of wasting time in contacting yr phone lines.

Can't access secure inbox from mobile Scan QR does not work after changing to a new phone despite signing up for the Citi Mobile Token on my new device and there is no alterate way to log into your secure inbox Scan QR works on the old phone but they don't let you authenticate after logging in I never had this problem with other banks

Very good apps however payment transaction history is quite misleading and confusing. Transaction that has been paid is not every detailed and clear. Once you click on those paid transaction it shows pay with points which is quite contradicting. Transaction history have to be detailed, clear, precise and simplified but overall it is a very good apps. üëçüëç

Updated 4May: I have written back to your customersvc mailbox with screenshots attached. Pls look into it. Edited 3May: I made payment through the app with a linked account in another bank. Goodness me... have to check and check multiple times and now initiate a transfer/payment from the other bank's app. Have to go through the hassle of requesting a waiver of late fee..

I have been using the new interface for a couple of months and its really bad. Previously, it was easy to tell how much has been paid, what is due and what will be due - could do so at a glance. Now i have to click here click there and wait for it to load. Its not intuitive at all. Its so difficult to search for statements as well. Help. Want to pay bills also so difficult. Really tempted to cancel my card because of the interface.

I can't open the app - unable to proceed. Need developer options. As I need to pay the credit card bill. Please let your IT developer to include my Phone model immediately without delays. Any late payment charges should be waived.
Poor, no fee waiver; require to call hotline, but hotline also cannot handle such request on Sunday. That is totally unacceptable nowadays.

This new version of Citibank app is a failure. Google phone (Model: Pixel 3 XL, Android version: 10) is not allowed to log in (stayed at circling blue-screen) -- a serious regression bug that was not existed in earlier versions -- poor interoperability. 0 star. It seems to drain my battery like crazy!! My phone used to last whole day and still left with around 20%, after updating the app, battery is only 3% after half day! What the heck is with this new forced update?!

For over two months I have problems logging into the app, the screen will be stuck spinning in loading circle after my biometric authentication. Even with password log in I can't log into the app. I end up having to try for consecutive days before I can log in and the cycle repeats. The app notifications also do not show up promptly when I've transactions, only showing up in dozens when I managed to log in spamming my phone with outdated notifications. Please fix this app.
Been two week, I cannot login to the application using fingerprint. Still waiting for the solution and hopefully they don't charge me because late payment due to login issue

Your Citibank apps sometimes login got problem. Uninstall and re-install and Reset my password and try still cannot login. Call the help line and support told me and try to reset and still unable to login my existing password. Thanks.

So many function leads to system error and cannot proceed. Instructions dont match the site as well even send enquiry email lead to error ...... No longer provide points breakdown.. and no points when using Gpay, must use physical card, told to me by customer support

I can't open the app and it expects me to read the entire paragraph of words why it can't (developer settings) like within seconds before it closes. Why is this app so special while I can use other bank apps easily
After updating the app, log in using fingerprint fails to work. No use having fanciful features when log in function fails and poses much inconvenience to user.

Please do not fix what is not broken!  After the update, the generation of mobile token is being obscured even more, and required logging in.  Additionally the verification code generated does not even work!  On top of that you get stuck on the generation of verification code page without a way to go back.  Over multiple versions of the app it just seems to get worse.  First there were login problems, then the fingerprint login did not work, and then now the verification code. It's almost as if you do not want users using your app.

it looks like citibank is really trying hard to avoid communicating with customers. no phone, no email, account mail messages that can't be sent due to "illegal" characters but they won't say which ones are illegal. And then there's that chat where they make you wait hours for someone to get back to you and if you don't reply to their message in 2 minutes, you get kicked off the queue BUT if you DO manage to hold on, customer support is pretty good. CS good. Bank sucks

Worst application ever! Now I'm rethinking my decisions in getting a credit card with this bank! Even the customer service didn't help at all! I proceeded to download the app and followed all steps in creating an account, however and after trying for several times, the mobile app response is still "ERROR". I did follow all the username and password criteria, but not sure why it's not working.

After paying my credit card amount using this app. The app "hang" with the progress status spinning non stop. Have to prematurely exit the app and restart again. This is the 2nd time I encountered. The same happened last month when I used it to pay for the first time. For security reason, I don't think I will be using this app for payment transactions again.

Website says your can damsel your card and do so much more in the app but now. So much services are hidden. Just like how frustrating the hotline is, repeating that the app is great at every option. And in order to reach the cancel option you've already spent 10mins on the line waiting for the recording to finish. App is slow, not responsive and mainly doesn't show many other banking needs. Totally not customer oriented, only cares that users are using their cc and putting money with them.

so often app upgrade, the display changes. it is unnecessary, after user get used to the display and ui, it is unfriendly to keep changing unless is really needed. Still find the app very unfriendly after using for awhile. when xfer, info on the screen should show from, to then amount, rather than amount, to then from. the sequence just not right.

App was 1000 times better previously. Now it takes either very long to load or impossible to use the app. The enable magnetic strip for overseas use is useless. Still have to rely on SMS sent for payment authorization. Since I was using another phone number overseas, I got my cards blocked and have to resort to borrowing from friends. Customer service hotline is next to useless and unprofessional. Time to change my primary bank.

When you supply a wrong pin code to the app, the app still generates an OTP, but a fake one to let you think everything is working. At the same time it locks your Internet banking account. There is no where that indicates your account is locked until you call the bank. What a waste of time. The app makes everything so secure that I no longer want to use it.

The reviews have affirmed my frustration about the app and I'm not alone. I have been using it to make my monthly payments. Suddenly, the function disappeared. Honestly, it's irritating to go through all the steps when paying online and then it hangs. Not once, not twice but 3 times. App increasingly force user to register finger print. Very bad.

Three issues I noticed with the new update. One. After viewing the monthly statement, there is no back button to home. Pressing on phone's back button also doesn't work. The most important one - I can't pay my credit card bill with my ready credit because I have funds inside. Ready credit displays funds with a negative sign. Therefore, it says I have insufficient funds.
Not working on Google pixel 7 pro, didn't even jailbreak or root, but the apps keep shown I root or jailbreak, I can't even check my apps on my statement

it recently added the feature to cashout your cashback. until recently you had to send a sms each time, some time it would work sometime it didn't. great experience from the bank that received an award for best banking app. I can't login sometimes because "it's unavailable", can't tell how much I need to pay for the credit card easily

Amazing, after 4 months nothing is still being done to the mobile app. The issue I raise last December 2019 is still happening. Horrible. So we put this on a device and for security reasons, it becomes limited to one device. If not, they send you endless OTPs for every single thinf you want to do. UX is bad. Back button doesn't work, you must tap on top left back button or top right X button, which is inconsistent and unnecessary because android already has a fixed back button. today i used App, told me update. i couldn't update it put button. i uninstalled this App, installed it again, but failed three times.

I rarely rate app, but this app has a number of issues: (1) 30+ seconds to load! This is ridiculous. There are clearly dependencies that should be skipped, like checking for location (2) No error returned if the OTP pin is incorrect. not able to access the app. keeps saying I have Developer Options enabled but this is wrong. I don't have it enabled.
This app very lousy! I can't get in to see anything! Very angry when I write in. Can't give any advice that helps! I won't know when to pay my bills! Get it fix!

Update on 17 Mar 2019. Tried installing the app again. It doesn't even start. Clicking on the icon just displays the message, "sorry, Citibank SG has stopped." ---- I've installed this for about a month, and have never even seen the login screen. Each time I click on the icon, the message "please wait a few seconds while we load", followed after a long time by "we are experiencing temporary delays, please try later."

One of the main things that consumers look for in digital banking apps is the ability to reach out to customer support conveniently, be it via a live chat function or having a mailbox on the app to send enquiries and get case support. It's kinda silly to have a Contact page directing users to phone banking instead. Point to consider for the UI/UX team.

reviewer: nIcHoLaS L (n I c H o L a S)
review: I can see why there are numerous adverse reviews. Had to install this app to activate a credit card. Was then prompted to create a login ID, which then led to an endless rejection of all my attempted suggested login IDs. Gave up trying after my 10th login ID was rejected by the app. Fortunately, the card got activated despite the failed attempts at getting a login ID. This process used to be much simpler via SMS... and much more convenient too.

many complaints i see for the 13 dec 2018 update.. i too experienced the buggy interface.. so i uninstalled and reinstalled.. and the app work again after that. However it's bad enough that an existing app cannot work after updates were done.. and it just adds to the bad review if we have to uninstall and reinstall an app after updates just to get it to work again. i hope improvements can be done to eventually eliminate this bad experience.. Thanks you.

Received my credit card statement. Login app to see the statement outstanding amount and paid. Next day, verified the statement balance $0 (fully settled my card bill). Went to have dinner that evening and swiped $40. Next day statement outstanding balance show $40 due almost immediately. This is seriously confusing and misleading when my new transaction could be added to past statement, incur late charges and fee if I did not notice.

The app sucks badly. It takes forever for the app to load the login screen. And most of the time the app just crash. When it works it is embarrassingly slow when you need to make a transfer or paynow. I saw alot of remarks in the review of people having this app blue screen waiting for it to load. Why isn't Citibank taking this seriously? Stop giving template reply to customer to email in and quote codes. Just admit the problem and address it. Where is the service excellence?? Fix the problem!

Was fine till recently when it kept telling me I have my Developer Settings enabled. After turning it off, it doesn't allow me to use my biometrics and issues a pw login. When going through the forget password process, it mentions no data found. Tried to create a new account, it says I don't have a secure connection. Man, what else do I need to do? Please resolve this ASAP.

New interface is a mess. They lumped everything together and does not give your bill due date or proper monthly statements. Looks like a cynical and disingenuous plan to extract late charges from customers. The above was 3 years ago and it's gotten even worse with each update.. now you have to go through a lot to see your balance and need an OTP just to see your own bill. I'd rate it negative stars if I could.

Update 2: The issue is back once the "advertorial" banner is back on the top. Update: The issue has been fixed after removing the "advertorial" banner on top of the homepage page. The app itself is okay for basic banking purposes. The first page is a bit laggy but still better than some other banks. Wow..

1. Back button on android doesn't work ie. can't go back to previous page (can only use the back button provided in app). 2. Can't copy paste sms otp to app. 3. Seriously, whoever is the Product Manager of this App, should be fired. This is a critical reason for which I am thinking of canceling my Citibank credit card. 1. Sluggish user interface design. For those who have trouble logging into Citi app, uninstall and reinstall the app and it should fix the problem. The issue is when you first open the app, there are 2 questions asked by the app to allow access to your phone call and location. If you disallow their access, you can't get to the Home screen and the 2 questions will not be asked again, thus making the app stuck in limbo. Remember to allow access when prompted!

I rarely post reviews but this bank app has got to be worst. 1) Chat function is horrible.
